alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 11:44AM PST until November 19 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MONDAY TO 2 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the second Wind Advisory, from 8 AM Monday to 2 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Locally stronger wind gusts to 70 mph are possible along the Santa Ana, wind-prone coastal slopes and canyons Monday night into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
